oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Robert Jones interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ed Caudill
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Robert Jones was a petty officer, first class, in the U.S. Navy, assigned to an air attack squadron aboard the USS Intrepid. He was an aviation electronics technician. This interview was conducted January 15, 2020, at the Blount County Public Library by Ed Caudill.
